title: Contribution of Intermediate Purchases Intensity for Manufacturing: Beverage Manufacturing (NAICS 3121) in the United States
notes: Contribution of Intermediate purchases are the value of produced goods and services which are used as energy, materials, and purchased services in an industry or sector's production process. intensity is the portion of labor productivity change attributed to purchased intermediate inputs.
